name: Awakened Shrub
languages: one language known by its creator

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.

action.name: Rake
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) slashing damage.

description:
An awakened shrub is an ordinary shrub given sentience and mobility by the awaken spell or similar magic.
Source: Monster Manual p. 317, Storm King's Thunder, Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Mythic Odysseys of Theros, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
